definition: اشر ašara u (ašr) to sow (هـ s.th.); -- i to file, sharpen with a file (هـ s.th.) II to mark, indicate, state, enter, record (هـ s.th.); to grant a visa; to provide with a visa (على s.th.) اشر ašar liveliness, high spirits, exuberance; wildness; insolence, impertinence اشر ašir lively, sprightly, in high spirits, exuberant; wild; insolent, impertinent, arrogant
